-- 工作台 select dm.city as city,COUNT(1) as dianmian_num FROM biz_dianmian dm
AND DATE_FORMAT( dm.input_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )
AND YEAR(dm.input_date) = YEAR(NOW())
GROUP BY dm.city

SELECT dandian_contract.dept_name, IFNULL(dandian_contract_num,0) dandian_contract_num, IFNULL(quyu_contract_num,0) quyu_contract_num FROM ( SELECT d.id dept_id,d.dept_name, temp.dandian_contract_num FROM ( SELECT bc.dept_id as dept_id, COUNT(1) as dandian_contract_num FROM biz_contract bc WHERE bc.produce = '0' -- 单店加盟 and DATE_FORMAT( bc.sign_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' ) and YEAR(bc.sign_date) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY bc.dept_id ) as temp LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.id = temp.dept_id ) as dandian_contract LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.id dept_id, d.dept_name, temp.quyu_contract_num FROM ( SELECT bc.dept_id as dept_id, COUNT(1) as quyu_contract_num FROM biz_contract bc WHERE bc.produce = '1' -- 区域加盟 and DATE_FORMAT( bc.sign_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' ) and YEAR(bc.sign_date) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY bc.dept_id ) as temp LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.id = temp.dept_id ) as quyu_contract ON dandian_contract.dept_id = quyu_contract.dept_id

SELECT sum(xiansuo_num) xiansuo_num, sum(customer_num) customer_num, sum(dandian_contract_num) dandian_contract_num, sum(quyu_contract_num) quyu_contract_num, sum(quyu_dianmian_num) quyu_dianmian_num, sum(dianmian_num) dianmian_num FROM (select IFNULL(xiansuo_num,0) xiansuo_num, IFNULL(customer_num,0) customer_num, IFNULL(dandian_contract_num,0) dandian_contract_num, IFNULL(quyu_contract_num,0) quyu_contract_num, IFNULL(quyu_dianmian_num,0) quyu_dianmian_num, IFNULL(dandian_contract_num,0) + IFNULL(quyu_dianmian_num,0) as dianmian_num FROM sys_dept d -- 线索和客户 left JOIN (SELECT c.dept_id dept_id, count(case when c.`status` = 0 then 1 end) xiansuo_num, -- 线索状态为0 count(case when c.`status` = 1 then 1 end) customer_num -- 客户状态为1 FROM biz_customer c WHERE 1=1 and c.resource <= '6' and to_days(c.input_date) = to_days(now()) and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(c.input_date) <= 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(c.input_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and YEAR(c.input_date) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY dept_id ) as xiansuo_num on xiansuo_num.dept_id = d.id -- 合同 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract.dept_id dept_id, count(case when contract.produce = 0 then 1 end) dandian_contract_num, count(case when contract.produce = 1 then 1 end) quyu_contract_num FROM biz_contract contract
1=1 and to_days(contract.sign_date) = to_days(now()) and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(contract.sign_date) <= 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(contract.sign_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and YEAR(contract.sign_date) = YEAR(NOW())
GROUP BY dept_id ) contract_num ON contract_num.dept_id = d.id -- 店面 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dianmian.dept_id, COUNT(dianmian.id) quyu_dianmian_num FROM biz_dianmian dianmian WHERE dianmian.type = 1 -- 区域加盟 and to_days(dianmian.input_date) = to_days(now()) and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(dianmian.input_date) <= 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(dianmian.input_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and YEAR(dianmian.input_date) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY dianmian.dept_id ) dianmian ON dianmian.dept_id = d.id
AND (d.id = #{deptId} OR d.id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM sys_dept t WHERE find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors)))
) t

select sum(lvyue_fee) lvyue_fee, sum(jingying_manager_fee) jingying_manager_fee, sum(yunying_manager_fee) yunying_manager_fee, sum(system_use_fee) system_use_fee, sum(system_maintenance_fee) system_maintenance_fee, sum(daiban_fee) daiban_fee, sum(guohuo_fee) guohuo_fee, IFNULL(sum(lvyue_fee), 0) + IFNULL(sum(jingying_manager_fee), 0) + IFNULL(sum(yunying_manager_fee), 0) + IFNULL(sum(system_use_fee), 0) + IFNULL(sum(system_maintenance_fee), 0) + IFNULL(sum(daiban_fee), 0) + IFNULL(sum(guohuo_fee), 0) as total_fee FROM ( select SUM(case when fee.type = '0' then fee.amount else 0 end) lvyue_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '1' then fee.amount else 0 end) jingying_manager_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '2' then fee.amount else 0 end) yunying_manager_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '3' then fee.amount else 0 end) system_use_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '4' then fee.amount else 0 end) system_maintenance_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '6' then fee.amount else 0 end) daiban_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '5' then fee.amount else 0 end) guohuo_fee FROM biz_contract_fee fee LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = fee.receiver_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on d.id = u.dept_id
and to_days(fee.input_date) = to_days(now()) and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(fee.input_date) <= 1 and YEARWEEK(date_format(fee.input_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and YEAR(fee.input_date) = YEAR(NOW())
AND (d.id = #{deptId} OR d.id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM sys_dept t WHERE find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors)))
GROUP BY u.dept_id ) fee
